name: Teddiursa
flavorText:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

previous.name: Sneasel
previous.flavorText:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.

next.name: Ursaring
next.flavorText:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.

pokemon.name: Ursaluna
pokemon.flavorText:
I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its
burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat
at will.
